mapper.select: SELECT QJD.JOB_NAME, QJD.JOB_GROUP, QJD.JOB_CLASS_NAME, QT.TRIGGER_NAME, QT.TRIGGER_GROUP, QCT.CRON_EXPRESSION, QCT.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS QJD JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS QT ON QJD.JOB_NAME = QT.JOB_NAME AND QJD.JOB_GROUP = QT.JOB_GROUP JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS QCT ON QT.TRIGGER_NAME = QCT.TRIGGER_NAME AND QT.TRIGGER_GROUP = QCT.TRIGGER_GROUP
